entry.title: https://github.com/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS-Kernel
entry.content: FreeRTOS kernel files only, submoduled into https://github.com/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS and various other repos.

entry.title: https://github.com/Mbed-TLS/mbedtls
entry.content: An open source, portable, easy to use, readable and flexible TLS library, and reference implementation of the PSA Cryptography API. Releases are on a varying cadence, typically around 3 - 6 months between releases.

entry.title: https://github.com/SanderMertens/flecs
entry.content: A fast entity component system (ECS) for C & C++

entry.title: https://github.com/UberGuidoZ/Flipper
entry.content: Playground (and dump) of stuff I make or modify for the Flipper Zero

entry.title: https://github.com/apache/nuttx
entry.content: Apache NuttX is a mature, real-time embedded operating system (RTOS)

entry.title: https://github.com/arthenica/ffmpeg-kit
entry.content: FFmpeg Kit for applications. Supports Android, Flutter, iOS, Linux, macOS, React Native and tvOS. Supersedes MobileFFmpeg, flutter_ffmpeg and react-native-ffmpeg.

entry.title: https://github.com/eclipse-mosquitto/mosquitto
entry.content: Eclipse Mosquitto - An open source MQTT broker

entry.title: https://github.com/git/git
entry.content: Git Source Code Mirror - This is a publish-only repository but pull requests can be turned into patches to the mailing list via GitGitGadget (https://gitgitgadget.github.io/). Please follow Documentation/SubmittingPatches procedure for any of your improvements.

entry.title: https://github.com/littlefs-project/littlefs
entry.content: A little fail-safe filesystem designed for microcontrollers

entry.title: https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs
entry.content: C library for prototyping and experimenting with quantum-resistant cryptography

entry.title: https://github.com/skot/ESP-Miner
entry.content: A bitcoin ASIC miner for the ESP32

entry.title: https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-buildimage
entry.content: Scripts which perform an installable binary image build for SONiC
